TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content: Seems to be fixed in v4.1.1
YES! Updated for 0.17! CURIOSTY TIME

heywaitaminnit...

There's no airbags anymore!?

heywaitaminnit...

There's no airbags anymore!?

There's no more nacelle since the 4.1 version is out, because I thought it was a little obsolete. But many of you ask me for the nacelle and the airbags, I'll work on an update to get them back.
Great, those airbags just looked cool.
yea though the airbags didint really help
I think that the airbags were more realistic for the MER-type rover, maybe you can make an MSL/Curiosity for us to skycrane?

I think that the airbags were more realistic for the MER-type rover, maybe you can make an MSL/Curiosity for us to skycrane?

I've got to finish the Battlecruiser (almost done) first, and I want to release a interstellar ship (90% modelised).

Making other rovers/probe are planed. I've got my ideas but yours are welcome too.

I've got to finish the Battlecruiser (almost done) first, and I want to release a interstellar ship (90% modelised).

Making other rovers/probe are planed. I've got my ideas but yours are welcome too.

I recommend you check out the Launchpad Obliterator - it removes the restriction you had with size of the Battlecruiser.
Something's wrong with these ships because whenever I load them it says I'm missing parts and the game freezes. What do?
Did you install the parts? u need them, and the .crafts
Yes. They worked in version 16 and I updated to the latest version of the parts twice and I still have the same problem.

you gotta make sure the parts are not in a sub-folder of KSP\parts

What i mean is:

This won't work:


KSP_win\

[INDENT]parts\
[/INDENT]


[INDENT=2]rover parts\
[/INDENT]
[INDENT=3]roverwheels\
[/INDENT]
[INDENT=4]part.cfg
[/INDENT]
[INDENT=3] rovercapsule\[/INDENT]
[INDENT=4]part.cfg
[/INDENT]
[INDENT=3] rovershell\[/INDENT]
[INDENT=4]part.cfg
[/INDENT]
[INDENT=3] etc. etc.
[/INDENT]

But this will:


KSP_win\

[INDENT]parts\
[/INDENT]


[INDENT=2]roverwheels\

[INDENT]part.cfg
[/INDENT]


rovercapsule\

[INDENT]part.cfg
[/INDENT]


rovershell\

[INDENT]part.cfg
[/INDENT]


etc. etc.
[/INDENT]

Also, you NEED to have Tosh's cart.dll plugin placed like this:

KSP_win\Plugins\cart.dll

Hope that helps!
I know how to put them in and I have all the plugins. I don't get what's happening still. sigh.
hmm, well that IS odd. I have it installed and have no issues with it so far

I noticed that on the Prometheus rover that the key command for unfolding the solar panels, camera and antenna is the "O" key and that the Cart plug-in also uses the "O" key for cruse control.

So every time I set the cruse control speed the rover folds up or down.
Amazing mod, it's obvious you put a lot of effort into it and it really did pay off . And, as a request, could you please make Romania's national flag?
Where are the airbag parts? they appear to be missing.

I noticed that on the Prometheus rover that the key command for unfolding the solar panels, camera and antenna is the "O" key and that the Cart plug-in also uses the "O" key for cruse control.

So every time I set the cruse control speed the rover folds up or down.

I'll make a patch to fix this tomorrow.

Amazing mod, it's obvious you put a lot of effort into it and it really did pay off . And, as a request, could you please make Romania's national flag?

Thank you. Romania flag added, enjoy.

Where are the airbag parts? they appear to be missing.

I remove them because I thought they were obsolete but many of you ask me so they(ll be back in a next update.

Yogui this is Somewhat an interior Tutorial, May help for the next update of the MEM

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/entry.php/168-Modders-Corner-Getting-Started-Modding-KSP

Would anyone help a fellow space traveller out? I searched the thread, but found very few answers. Using the solar rover, attached to various lifters, i get that problem where, as the rocket stages and decouples, the focus ends up being miles below the actual craft. Rocket still flies perfectly, everything else works fine, but i cant see anything but space, or a (very small) rocket if i zoom out enough. Anyone else having the same problems, or anyone have a workaround or a fix? This looks like a great mod to begin the exploration of our new solar system, but im having trouble getting out of the atmosphere, let alone land it on Duna.

Would anyone help a fellow space traveller out? I searched the thread, but found very few answers. Using the solar rover, attached to various lifters, i get that problem where, as the rocket stages and decouples, the focus ends up being miles below the actual craft. Rocket still flies perfectly, everything else works fine, but i cant see anything but space, or a (very small) rocket if i zoom out enough. Anyone else having the same problems, or anyone have a workaround or a fix? This looks like a great mod to begin the exploration of our new solar system, but im having trouble getting out of the atmosphere, let alone land it on Duna.

It's a MultiJoint plugin bug. It occures sometimes at very high speed.

I noticed this today, made flying my new legacy very weird. only did this within the atmosphere of kerbin on the ascent and fixed with going to the tracking facility and back again... then it happened again during my descent on eve, this however didnt cause me to crash as the land below me was actually water :S I should have read the 17.1 patch notes before I went
Thats weird he said it 2 times.
